sources.title: A Clean Shaven Man (1936)
sources.description: That's what Olive wants. To even the score, the boys visit Wimpy's barber shop. Wimpy is out, so they shave each other; you'd think Popeye would know better than to let Bluto at him with a razor. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-clean-shaven-man-1936/

metadata.Plot: That's what Olive wants. To even the score, the boys visit Wimpy's barber shop. Wimpy is out, so they shave each other; you'd think Popeye would know better than to let Bluto at him with a razor.
metadata.Actors: Jack Mercer, Mae Questel, Gus Wicke
